name: chikox
description: Full-stack TypeScript monorepo with Fastify, Next.js, and Prisma

scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build --workspaces --if-present
scripts.build:packages: npm run db:generate && npm run build --workspace=packages/database && npm run build --workspace=packages/types
scripts.build:server: npm run build:packages && npm run build --workspace=apps/server
scripts.build:client: npm run build:packages && npm run build --workspace=apps/client
scripts.build:admin: npm run build:packages && npm run build --workspace=apps/admin
scripts.type-check: tsc --noEmit -p apps/server && tsc --noEmit -p apps/client && tsc --noEmit -p apps/admin
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules apps/*/.next apps/*/dist packages/*/node_modules packages/*/dist
